Article.ArticleTitle: Call for Balancing the Risks and Benefits of Immunotherapeutic Agents for Lymphoma during the COVID-19 Pandemic.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Internal Medicine, Seoul National University College of Medicine, Seoul, Korea.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: WBP is associate editor of Infect Chemother; however, he did not involve in the peer reviewer selection, evaluation, and decision process of this article. Otherwise, no potential conflicts of interest relevant to this article was reported.
